En general it was what i expected, so now i have a nice portfolio.. thank you!

results.content: I always wanted to make my own personal portfolio website. Following this course and Biplov step by step, I successfully made my very first responsive portfolio. The course was flexible and I gave my own creativity to it. It was really easy to follow along, and the outcome was just too beautiful. I really love the product I made following this course. I really recommend this course to every one. It is very easy to follow along and you can get it done in time. Thanks Biplov and udemy.
